name: Skate & Date [ New Demo]
description:
Press kit! || Twitter || And on Kickstarter!! 

If you play the game please fill out THIS feedback form! It's to ensure Skate & Date is the best that it can be! Thanks <3

Skate & Date is a roller derby rhythm ga(y)me where you play as Maggie, the lead jammer of the Rockin Rollergirls!
She has a bit of a crush on Patricia – one of the opponents on the rival team.
Your objective: to impress her with your sick roller derby skills!

There are 4 different endings in the demo! There are also some planned updates for the demo that will come soon.

Feel free to comment with feedback/bugs down below!! 

Update 3/25/18: Fixed some UI misplacements and players can now restart Story Mode after finishing it
Update 5/6/18:  See Devlog#2 for all changes 

Known Bugs:

- The web build sometimes lags
- When starting "Questionable Beginnings" there's some optional beats there when there shouldn't be!
